hero.subtitle: At Clínica Ferreira Borges, in Campo de Ourique, Lisbon, we believe that every smile is unique...

services.title: Treatment You'll Love
services.subtitle: At our dental clinic, we offer a wide range of personalized treatments, designed for your well-being and oral health. From aesthetic treatments to complex procedures, everything is performed with the utmost precision and care, ensuring a smile you will love.
services.notFound: Can't find the treatment you're looking for?

aparelho-invisivel.title: Clear Aligners
aparelho-invisivel.description: Get a perfect smile with total discretion using clear aligners. At Clínica Ferreira Borges, aesthetics meets functionality for impressive results.

branqueamento.title: Whitening
branqueamento.description: Brighten your smile with our advanced teeth whitening. At Ferreira Borges Clinic, we offer safe, effective treatments tailored to you. Visit us for a radiant smile and exceptional dental care.

cirurgia-oral.title: Oral Surgery
cirurgia-oral.description: Trust our oral surgery team for advanced treatments with safety and precision. At Clínica Ferreira Borges, your oral health is in good hands.

consulta-dentaria.title: Dental Consultation
consulta-dentaria.description: Schedule your dental appointment at Clínica Ferreira Borges and take the first step towards a healthy and radiant smile. Personalized care at your disposal.

dentisteria.title: Aesthetic Restorations
dentisteria.description: Discover excellence in dentistry at Clínica Ferreira Borges. We combine state-of-the-art technology and a personalized approach to restore the health and beauty of your teeth.

dor-orofacial.title: Orofacial Pain
dor-orofacial.description: Find relief for orofacial pain with our specialized approach. At Clínica Ferreira Borges, we combine knowledge and technology to effectively treat your pain.

endodontia.title: Endodontics
endodontia.description: Preserve your dental health with cutting-edge endodontic treatments. At Clínica Ferreira Borges, we take care whenever possible to preserve your teeth, maintaining their integrity and beauty.

implantes-dentarios.title: Dental Implants
implantes-dentarios.description: Transform your smile with our state-of-the-art dental implants. Regain trust and enjoy a full life with personalized solutions at Clínica Ferreira Borges.

limpeza-dentaria.title: Dental Cleaning
limpeza-dentaria.description: Keep your smile bright with our dental cleaning and detartarization, using Guided Biofilm Therapy (GBT). Visit the Ferreira Borges Clinic for preventive care and preserve the health of your teeth with the most advanced oral hygiene technology.

medicina-dentaria-do-sono.title: Sleep Apnea
medicina-dentaria-do-sono.description: Rediscover the pleasure of sleeping well. Our innovative dental sleep medicine solutions effectively combat apnea, promoting restful nights and energized days.

odontopediatria.title: Paediatric Dentistry
odontopediatria.description: Ensure a healthy smile for your little ones with our pediatric dentistry team. At Clínica Ferreira Borges, we care for your family's smile since early childhood.

ortodontia.title: Orthodontics
ortodontia.description: Smile with confidence with our orthodontic treatments. At Clínica Ferreira Borges, we offer customized solutions that guarantee excellent aesthetic and functional results.

periodontologia.title: Periodontology
periodontologia.description: Protect the foundations of your smile with our periodontal treatments. At Clínica Ferreira Borges, we take care of your gum health with maximum effectiveness.

reabilitacao-oral.title: Prosthodontics
reabilitacao-oral.description: Restore the functionality and aesthetics of your smile with our prosthodontics solutions. Clínica Ferreira Borges offers integrated solutions for all your dental needs.

restauracao-estetica.title: Cosmetic Dentistry
restauracao-estetica.description: Revitalize your smile with cosmetic dentistry at Clínica Ferreira Borges. Our solutions combine art and science to restore the natural beauty of your teeth.

faqs.label: FAQs
faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Find answers to your most common questions

q1.question: How long does an appointment take?
q1.answer: A routine appointment typically takes between 30 to 60 minutes. More complex appointments may require additional time.

q2.question: Do you accept health insurance?
q2.answer: Yes, we work with major health insurance providers in Portugal. Contact us to confirm if your insurance is accepted.

q3.question: What is your cancellation policy?
q3.answer: We ask that you cancel with at least 24 hours notice. Last-minute cancellations may be subject to a fee.

q4.question: Do you offer financing plans?
q4.answer: Yes, we have partnerships with several financial institutions to offer flexible financing solutions to our patients.

q5.question: Do you have parking?
q5.answer: Free parking is available on streets near the clinic. We also have partnerships with parking facilities in the area.

q6.question: How can I book an appointment?
q6.answer: You can book via our phone number 935 189 807, by email, or through the contact form on our website.

intro.title: Specialized Dental Treatment in Lisbon
intro.description: At Clínica Ferreira Borges, we offer excellent dental treatments in Campo de Ourique, Lisbon. With over 20 years of experience, advanced technology and a highly qualified team, we guarantee superior and lasting results for your smile. Each treatment is personalized according to the specific needs of each patient, ensuring maximum comfort and satisfaction.

technology.label: Technology
technology.title: State-of-the-Art Dental Technology in Lisbon
technology.p1: Our dental clinic in Campo de Ourique features the most advanced technology available in modern dentistry. From 3D intraoral scanners to digital radiology and CBCT imaging, we invest in cutting-edge equipment to ensure precision and comfort in every treatment.
technology.p2: This technological excellence allows our Lisbon dentists to perform more accurate diagnoses, plan treatments with greater predictability, and deliver superior results. Every dental procedure benefits from our commitment to innovation and quality care.
technology.p3: Experience the difference that advanced dental technology makes at our Campo de Ourique clinic. Our modern equipment not only improves treatment outcomes but also enhances patient comfort, making your dental care experience in Lisbon truly exceptional.

team.label: Our Team
team.title: Expert Dentists in Campo de Ourique, Lisbon
team.p1: Our dental team comprises highly qualified professionals with extensive experience in specialized treatments. Each dentist at our Lisbon clinic brings international training and a commitment to continuous education, ensuring you receive world-class dental care.
team.p2: With over 20 years of combined experience serving the Campo de Ourique community, our dentists have successfully completed thousands of dental treatments. We specialize in comprehensive oral care, from preventive dentistry to complex restorations and cosmetic procedures.
team.p3: What sets our dental clinic apart is our patient-centered approach. Every member of our Lisbon team is dedicated to making your dental experience comfortable and stress-free, while delivering exceptional results that transform smiles and boost confidence.

footer.title: Transform Your Smile at Our Lisbon Dental Clinic
footer.p1: At Clínica Ferreira Borges in Campo de Ourique, we're committed to providing exceptional dental care to the Lisbon community. Our experienced dentists, advanced technology, and patient-focused approach make us the preferred choice for quality dental treatment.
footer.p2: Whether you're seeking preventive care, cosmetic dentistry, or complex restorations, our Lisbon clinic offers comprehensive solutions tailored to your unique needs. We accept major insurance plans and offer flexible financing to make quality dental care accessible.
footer.p3: Schedule your consultation today and discover why thousands of patients trust our Campo de Ourique dental clinic for their oral health. Contact us at 935 189 807 or book online for convenient appointment times that fit your schedule.

whatIs.label: What Is
whatIs.title: What Is This Dental Treatment?
whatIs.content: This advanced dental treatment is performed at our clinic in Campo de Ourique, Lisbon, using state-of-the-art technology and modern techniques. With over 20 years of experience, our specialized team of dentists guarantees exceptional and lasting results, always focusing on patient comfort and satisfaction. Each procedure is carefully planned and executed with precision to ensure the best results.

forWhom.label: For Whom
forWhom.title: Who Is This Dental Treatment For?
forWhom.content: This dental treatment is ideal for patients looking to improve their oral health and aesthetics. Suitable for adults and young people seeking effective and lasting results. During the evaluation consultation at our Lisbon clinic, our experienced dentist will analyze your specific case, perform a complete diagnosis and recommend the best personalized treatment plan for your individual needs.

duration.label: Duration
duration.title: How Long Does It Take?
duration.content: Treatment duration varies according to each individual case. During the initial consultation, we perform a complete evaluation and present a detailed treatment plan, including estimated time. Our Lisbon clinic offers flexible schedules to adapt to your routine.

location.label: Location
location.title: Clinic in Campo de Ourique, Lisbon
location.content: Clínica Ferreira Borges is located in Campo de Ourique, one of Lisbon's most emblematic areas, with easy access by public transport and parking nearby. Our modern facilities provide a comfortable and welcoming environment for all our patients.

technology.label: Technology
technology.title: Technology and Equipment
technology.content: We continuously invest in cutting-edge technology to ensure the best results. Our clinic is equipped with 3D intraoral scanners, digital radiology, microscopy and other modern equipment that allow accurate diagnoses and more comfortable and effective treatments.

aftercare.label: Aftercare
aftercare.title: Post-Treatment Care
aftercare.content: After treatment, we provide detailed instructions on the necessary care to ensure the best long-term results. Our team is always available to answer questions and perform follow-up consultations, ensuring your treatment achieves the expected success.

seoContent.title: Excellence in Dental Care at Campo de Ourique, Lisbon
seoContent.subtitle: Advanced dental treatment with proven results and personalized care

location.title: Prime Location in Campo de Ourique
location.description: Our dental clinic is strategically located in Campo de Ourique, one of Lisbon's most accessible and charming neighborhoods. With convenient public transport connections and nearby parking, we make quality dental care easily accessible to all Lisbon residents and visitors.

credentials.title: Qualified and Experienced Dentists
credentials.description: Our team of dentists in Lisbon holds advanced degrees and international certifications, with over 20 years of combined experience. All our professionals are registered with the Portuguese Dental Association (OMD), ensuring the highest standards of dental care for every patient.

technology.title: State-of-the-Art Dental Technology
technology.description: We invest in the most advanced dental equipment available, including 3D intraoral scanners, CBCT imaging, digital radiology, and dental microscopy. This cutting-edge technology allows for more accurate diagnoses, precise treatments, and superior patient comfort at our Lisbon clinic.

availability.title: Flexible Scheduling Options
availability.description: Understanding the demands of modern life, our Campo de Ourique clinic offers extended hours and flexible appointment scheduling. We accommodate your busy lifestyle with convenient morning, afternoon, and evening appointments throughout the week.

care.title: Personalized Patient Care
care.description: Every patient at our Lisbon dental clinic receives individualized attention and a customized treatment plan. We take time to understand your concerns, goals, and expectations, ensuring a comfortable experience and optimal results tailored specifically to your needs.

safety.title: Strict Safety and Hygiene Protocols
safety.description: Your safety is our top priority. We follow rigorous sterilization protocols and DGS health guidelines, using advanced autoclave systems and maintaining the highest standards of hygiene. Our Campo de Ourique clinic is fully certified and regularly inspected for compliance.

seoFooter.title: Your Trusted Dental Clinic in Campo de Ourique, Lisbon
seoFooter.p1: At Clínica Ferreira Borges, we're proud to serve the Campo de Ourique community and greater Lisbon area with exceptional dental care. Our commitment to clinical excellence, patient comfort, and continuous innovation has made us a trusted choice for thousands of patients seeking quality dental treatment in Lisbon.
seoFooter.p2: Whether you're looking for preventive dental care, cosmetic dentistry, complex restorations, or specialized treatments, our experienced team of dentists in Campo de Ourique provides comprehensive solutions using the latest technology and proven techniques. We work with major insurance providers and offer flexible financing options to make quality dental care accessible and affordable.
seoFooter.p3: Take the first step towards your perfect smile today. Contact our Lisbon dental clinic at 935 189 807 or book your consultation online. We offer convenient appointment times, multilingual service, and a welcoming environment where your oral health and satisfaction are our priorities. Discover why residents across Lisbon trust Clínica Ferreira Borges for their dental care needs.

technology.label: Technology
technology.title: Advanced Technology
technology.subtitle: State-of-the-art equipment for more precise, comfortable and efficient treatments

intraoralScanner.title: Intraoral Scanners
intraoralScanner.description: State-of-the-art 3D scanning technology for precise and comfortable captures of your oral cavity, eliminating the need for traditional impressions.

cbct.title: CBCT - Computed Tomography
cbct.description: High-resolution 3D imaging system that allows visualization of dental and bone structures with exceptional detail for more accurate diagnoses.

smileDesign.title: 3D Smile Design
smileDesign.description: Advanced software that allows you to visualize the final result of your treatment before it even begins, providing personalized and predictable planning.

digitalRadiology.title: Digital Radiology
digitalRadiology.description: Digital radiography equipment with lower radiation exposure and instant results.

microscopy.title: Dental Microscopy
microscopy.description: Visual amplification for precision treatments and superior results.

photography.title: Intraoral Photography
photography.description: Specialized photography system for detailed clinical documentation.

technology.trustStatement: We constantly invest in the most advanced technology to offer the best results and the best experience to our patients.

cta.title: Experience the Difference of Advanced Technology
cta.subtitle: Schedule your consultation and discover how technology can improve your treatment
